Use a sun umbrella: A portable sun umbrella can be a convenient and effective way to shield your head from the sun.
Wear a scarf: A scarf can be wrapped around your head to provide shade and protect your scalp from sunburn.
Apply sunscreen: Even if you don't have hair, you can still apply sunscreen to your scalp to protect it from sunburn.
Wear a wig: A wig can provide a layer of protection for your scalp and help shield your head from the sun.
Use a hairpiece: A hairpiece can be attached to your scalp to provide some shade and protect your head from sunburn.
